title: Russians leave Chernobyl site as fighting rages elsewhere
content:
1. Russians leave Chernobyl site as fighting rages elsewhere  The Associated Press
  2. Russians leaving Chernobyl as fighting rages elsewhere  WGN News
  3. Russian troops have withdrawn from Chernobyl, says Ukrainian nuclear operator  CNN
  4. Russian Troops Suffer ‘Acute Radiation Sickness’ After Digging Chernobyl Trenches  Yahoo News
  5. Russians hand control of Chornobyl nuclear plant back to Ukraine, IAEA says  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
